评论详情: My boyfriend hates scratchy sweaters so this was a win!
gift for my son's birthday. He liked it very much Phyllis McGuirk
This is a beautiful soft sweater. The color blue is bight.
Sweater is thick and warm. Size is accurate

This quirky sweater is amazing! It is so soft, warm and a bit heavy but in a good way. The fabric feels like real quality! The cat design on the front and back match up great and has gotten a few laughs and a lot of compliments. I would be cautious washing it. Im not sure if it says somewhere how to take care of it, but it fits perfect and I worry about shrinking with this material so I have hang dried mine. Purrr-fect sweater for any cat lover!

I’m reviewing a size XS. I’m 5’2 and I weigh 130 lbs. my usual size is a medium. I’m glad I did pick a size extra small. I also added a picture of the back of the sweater just so everybody could see what the back would look like once it was on. It’s very well-made. It’s not itchy at all. It looks really cute with the pair of leggings. But if you want it to fit and not look oversized, I would go down by two sizes. It’s an adorable sweater.

The sweater has a unique stylish look that can make an outfit stand out. It has a nice oversized fit that I appreciate. I was shocked at its quality, it’s soft and has a nice weight to it showcasing its awesome quality. It keeps me warm and comfortable.

评论概述: Sweater quality is great.  Print is good.  Spelling error on the front.
评论详情: The sweater itself is great.  It's soft and comfortable.  The Van Gogh print on the sleeve is sewed on, which is great.  Overall, I really like the style.  But the sewed lettering on the front is messy and not very clear - might be a good thing because they misspelled "Potao Eaters" (it shows eatArs) which is too bad.  It looks like it says 1883 for Potato eaters - but it should be 1885.
Beautiful sweater looks exactly as pictured I size down because I’m a female and plan to wear it

评论概述: Very soft and cute oversized sweater
评论详情: This sweater is actually even cuter in person than I expected! I ordered for my teen daughter. The sizing was as expected. The notes had advised that this sweater is oversized, so we were careful to check the sizing. It was very cute in person and extra soft.

评论概述: Amazing sweater except the arm patch
评论详情: THe sweater itself is soft and nice weight. It held up nicely to wash. My teen son loved it, except the patch. I was expecting a nice cloth patch I think, but it is a weird, cheap tarp plastic kind of feel that just doesnt match the vibe of the rest of the garment.  I think he may end up taking off the patch... bummer bc it is a super unique concept.

This sweater is all that you would expect - well made, attractive, and the ability to keep one warm.  I have no complaints about this sweater - even my cats like it - before I could put it away, I found a cat sleeping on it.

Okay, since I've given this to my 15yo kiddo, she's worn it twice in the same week. It's so soft and crazy cute! She loves things that are oversized and cozy, but when they were out of the black cat sweater in large, I took a chance and ordered her size of Medium in it. Win! The Medium sweater is nicely baggy on her, and she can still tuck the front into jeans so it looks neater or changes the outfit. The front and back have different images, of a front and back of the cat, and are well placed and matched proportionately.  The weave used really is so very soft and cuddly, and reminds me of a snuggly hug. It looks more expensive than the price really was, so it was a total win for this mom and her teen!

We are a cat friendly house and we love anything cat, so of course I’m was going to love this sweater. The sweater itself seems well made, the cat picture looks just like the promotional picture. It’s comfortable & seems warm, but I ordered it for the cat, the comfort and warmth are just nice bonuses. Love that the back of the sweater also has the back of the cat.  I’m 5’11” / 175 and the medium fits well, in fact, I think it’s the correct size for me. However, I could swear I ordered a large because I wanted it to be a little oversized, but I was delivered a medium, and my order shows it was a medium and at the time of this writing a large isn’t even available, so maybe I’m losing my memory… what was I talking about? I could also swear there was a size chart, but now it just shows a conversion chart for women. I could be wrong, just odd. Here’s my point, if you want it to be oversized… size up.

评论概述: Comfortable, Soft and Attractive Cat Design
评论详情: This Yimoon Mens Van Gogh Graphic Sweater looks and feels very nice for a unique and attractive look. The material feels soft and is lightweight but warm. My teen son is modeling this sweater in size Small, and it fits him perfectly.

The Yimoon Knitted Long Sleeve Pullover is the very best Van Gogh-inspired knitted sweater. The video shows the perfect fit. The knitted material is comfortable and can be worn alone or layered. As you can see, the distinctive blue and white Van Gogh-like graphic design is unique, eye catching and on point. I like that.  I highly recommend Yimoon’s excellent Knitted Long Sleeve Pullover to everyone.
